talk.author: did:plc:o6ibgputv3kmdq6ebzd27ezx
talk.utter: I enjoyed it. But I missed the kinds of sentences that Clive wrote in The Damnation Game and the Books of Blood.

talk.author: did:plc:nc5npzuyf3i23qi4gkcnidlm
talk.utter: Neil, what do you think of japanese animations like akira, nausica and grave of the fireflies? Is there anything in particular that you like/recommend? Hugs from Brazil, I'm a big fan!

talk.author: did:plc:o6ibgputv3kmdq6ebzd27ezx
talk.utter: My favourite is still Princess Mononoke, for obvious reasons.
